result.purpose: Responsible for handling various discovery-related operations such as announcements, events, feature banners, home banners, products, and tokens.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, organizing related functionalities into separate files for clarity and maintainability.

internal/handlers/discovery/announcement.purpose: Handles announcement-related operations such as creating, deleting, and listing banners.

internal/handlers/discovery/event.go.purpose: Handles event-related operations for the discovery service.

internal/handlers/discovery/feature_bann.purpose: Handles feature banner creation, deletion, and retrieval in the discovery module.

internal/handlers/discovery/generic.go.purpose: Defines a generic handler for discovery-related operations in the application.

internal/handlers/discovery/helpers.go.purpose: Provides helper functions for validating and checking duplicates in widget layouts for discovery handlers.

internal/handlers/discovery/home_banner..purpose: Handles operations related to home banners in the discovery module.

internal/handlers/discovery/layout.go.purpose: Handles discovery-related functionalities and validations for widgets in the application.

internal/handlers/discovery/product.go.purpose: Handles product-related operations for the discovery service.

internal/handlers/discovery/product.help.purpose: Handles mapping and copying of product and social platform data for discovery features.

internal/handlers/discovery/tokens.go.purpose: Handles requests for trending tokens in the discovery domain.
